CodeList.Title: Measured attribute code for despatch advice (UNCL6313 Subset) T120

Code.Name: Goods item gross weight
Code.Description: Weight (mass) of goods including packing but excluding the carrier's equipment.

Code.Name: Gross volume
Code.Description: The volume unadjusted for factors such as temperature or gravity.

Code.Name: Loading meters
Code.Description: The length in a vehicle, whereby the complete width and height over that length is needed for the goods.

Code.Name: Length
Code.Description: To specify the value of a length dimension
